page.title: 19A.R.C Concrete Pipeline Co.
page.content: 250 pipes made each day in moulds from locally quarried sand & stone.Tilcon, Scorton supply 250 tonnes per day, which will increase by 300% in near future.54 people employed,3 being women.Haulage is on contract.A.R.C{ { established from earlier companies, originally beginning in 1900s.Took over present site in 1981 from concrete company established in 1969. Only pipes made on this site,which is ideal for Scottish & northern markets. A.R.C are now turning to computers to store orders for pipes,which are distributed all over the U.K.The company is expanding and within next 12 months Â£1.25 million will be spent on new machinery which will increase production by 300%.At present one pipe is made every 8 minutes.{
